variable.name: dupok
variable.description: DCCT: NOTE: DCC reports that this variable was used for internal data management and should be ignored by analysts.

variable.name: form
variable.description: DCCT: DCCT form number

variable.name: fsasdate
variable.description: DCCT: Form date as SAS date value

variable.name: ibc2a
variable.description: DCCT: Parent was with patient at onset of symptoms

variable.name: ibc2b
variable.description: DCCT: Classmate was w/patient at onset of symptoms

variable.name: ibc2c
variable.description: DCCT: Passerby was w/patient at onset of symptoms

variable.name: ibc2d
variable.description: DCCT: Person who is not a parent, etc. was w/patient at onset of symptoms

variable.name: ibc2e
variable.description: DCCT: Patient was alone at onset of symptoms

variable.name: ibc2f
variable.description: DCCT: Unknown who was with patient at time of symptoms' onset: patient cannot recall

variable.name: ibc3
variable.description: DCCT: Person w/patient recognized symptoms of hypoglycemia

variable.name: ibc4
variable.description: DCCT: Person w/patient was able to reduce severity of hypoglycemia

variable.name: ibc5a
variable.description: DCCT: During hypoglycemic episode: person present gave patient oral carbohydrates

variable.name: ibc5b
variable.description: DCCT: During hypoglycemic episode: person present gave patient glucagon

variable.name: ibc5c
variable.description: DCCT: During hypoglycemic episode: unknown what person present gave patient

variable.name: ibc5d
variable.description: DCCT: During hypoglycemic episode: what else person present did to help patient (specify)

variable.name: ibclindt
variable.description: DCCT: Date clinic learned of hypoglycemic event

variable.name: ibd1a
variable.description: DCCT: Approximate time frame of onset of hypoglycemic episode

variable.name: ibd1b
variable.description: DCCT: Exact time - onset of episode

variable.name: ibd1c
variable.description: DCCT: Exact time of onset: a.m., p.m., or unknown

variable.name: ibe1
variable.description: DCCT: Patient's location at onset of episode

variable.name: ibe2a
variable.description: DCCT: If patient was awake, were there warning signs/symptoms

variable.name: ibe2b
variable.description: DCCT: Symptoms were recognized as hypoglycemic symptoms by patient

variable.name: ibe2c
variable.description: DCCT: Symptoms were recognized as hypoglycemic symptoms by another person

variable.name: ibf10a
variable.description: DCCT: Patient carried usually something to treat reactions

variable.name: ibf10b
variable.description: DCCT: Patient had something to treat reactions at time of hypoglycemic event

variable.name: ibf1a
variable.description: DCCT: Type of exercise during 4 hours (see variable ibd1a) of estimated on-set of hypoglycemia

variable.name: ibf1b
variable.description: DCCT: Unusual exercise during 4 hours (see variable ibd1a) of estimated on-set of hypoglycemia

variable.name: ibf1c
variable.description: DCCT: Type of exercise 24 hours prior to hypoglycemic event (see variable ibd1a)

variable.name: ibf1d
variable.description: DCCT: Unusual exercise 24 hours prior to event (see variable ibd1a)

variable.name: ibf20dat
variable.description: DCCT: Date on which form 20 (and/or 83) was completed

variable.name: ibf2a1
variable.description: DCCT: Patient's diet at estimated on-set time of hypoglycemic event (4 hours, see variable ibd1a): missed meal

variable.name: ibf2a2
variable.description: DCCT: Patient's diet at estimated on-set time of hypoglycemic event (4 hours, see variable ibd1a): missed snack

variable.name: ibf2a3
variable.description: DCCT: Patient's diet at estimated on-set time of hypoglycemic event (4 hours, see variable ibd1a): missed - unknown

variable.name: ibf2a4
variable.description: DCCT: Patient's diet at estimated on-set time of hypoglycemic event (4 hours, see variable ibd1a): delayed meal

variable.name: ibf2a5
variable.description: DCCT: Patient's diet at estimated on-set time of hypoglycemic event (4 hours, see variable ibd1a): delayed snack

variable.name: ibf2a6
variable.description: DCCT: Patient's diet at estimated on-set time of hypoglycemic event (4 hours, see variable ibd1a): delayed - unknown

variable.name: ibf2a7
variable.description: DCCT: Patient's diet at estimated on-set time of hypoglycemic event (4 hours, see variable ibd1a): ate less than usual - no
variable.value: DID NOT EAT LESS THAN USUAL

variable.name: ibf2a8
variable.description: DCCT: Patient's diet at estimated on-set time of hypoglycemic event (4 hours, see variable ibd1a): ate less than usual - yes

variable.name: ibf2a9
variable.description: DCCT: Patient's diet at estimated on-set time of hypoglycemic event (4 hours, see variable ibd1a): ate less than usual - unknown

variable.name: ibf2b1
variable.description: DCCT: Patient's diet 24 hours before estimated on-set time of hypoglycemic event (see variable ibd1a): missed meal

variable.name: ibf2b2
variable.description: DCCT: Patient's diet 24 hours before estimated on-set time of hypoglycemic event (see variable ibd1a): missed snack

variable.name: ibf2b3
variable.description: DCCT: Patient's diet 24 hours before estimated on-set time of hypoglycemic event (see variable ibd1a): missed - unknown

variable.name: ibf2b4
variable.description: DCCT: Patient's diet 24 hours before estimated on-set time of hypoglycemic event (see variable ibd1a): delayed meal

variable.name: ibf2b5
variable.description: DCCT: Patient's diet 24 hours before estimated on-set time of hypoglycemic event (see variable ibd1a): delayed snack

variable.name: ibf2b6
variable.description: DCCT: Patient's diet 24 hours before estimated on-set time of hypoglycemic event (see variable ibd1a): delayed - unknown

variable.name: ibf2b7
variable.description: DCCT: Patient's diet 24 hours before estimated on-set time of hypoglycemic event (see variable ibd1a): ate less than usual - no
variable.value: DID NOT EAT LESS THAN USUAL

variable.name: ibf2b8
variable.description: DCCT: Patient's diet 24 hours before estimated on-set time of hypoglycemic event (see variable ibd1a): ate less than usual - yes

variable.name: ibf2b9
variable.description: DCCT: Patient's diet 24 hours before estimated on-set time of hypoglycemic event (see variable ibd1a): ate less than usual - unknown

variable.name: ibf3a1
variable.description: DCCT: Any alteration of insulin dose during 4 hours (see variable ibd1a) of estimated on-set time of hypoglycemic event

variable.name: ibf3a2
variable.description: DCCT: Any alteration of insulin dose 24 hours before estimated on-set time of hypoglycemic event (see variable ibd1a)

variable.name: ibf3b1
variable.description: DCCT: Any deviation of timing/scheduling of insulin during 4 hours (see variable ibd1a) of estimated on-set time of hypoglycemic event

variable.name: ibf3b2
variable.description: DCCT: Any deviation of timing/scheduling of insulin 24 hours before estimated on-set time of hypoglycemic event (see variable ibd1a)

variable.name: ibf4a
variable.description: DCCT: Sexual activity during 4 hours (see variable ibd1a) of estimated on-set time of hypoglycemic event

variable.name: ibf4b
variable.description: DCCT: Sexual activity 24 hours before estimated on-set time of hypoglycemic event (see variable ibd1a)

variable.name: ibf5a
variable.description: DCCT: Any alcohol/drug use during 4 hours (see variable ibd1a) of estimated on-set time of hypoglycemic event

variable.name: ibf5b
variable.description: DCCT: Any alcohol/drug use 24 hours before estimated on-set time of hypoglycemic event (see variable ibd1a)

variable.name: ibf6a
variable.description: DCCT: Percentage of the expected glucose monitoring tests done before hypoglycemic event

variable.name: ibf6b
variable.description: DCCT: Were all expected glucose tests performed during 24 hours prior to hypoglycemic episode

variable.name: ibf6c
variable.description: DCCT: During the week prior to the hypoglycemic event did patient perform 3 a.m. blood glucose testing (if applicable)

variable.name: ibf6d
variable.description: DCCT: 3 a.m. value of blood glucose test - before hypoglycemic event

variable.name: ibf7a
variable.description: DCCT: Patient was menstruating at time of hypoglycemic episode

variable.name: ibf7b
variable.description: DCCT: Oral contraceptives were used at the time of hypoglycemic event

variable.name: ibf7c1
variable.description: DCCT: Patient's menses cycle is: regular, irregular, unknown

variable.name: ibf7c2
variable.description: DCCT: If regular - usual length of menses cycle

variable.name: ibf7d
variable.description: DCCT: Blood or urine glucose fluctuated around time of menses

variable.name: ibf8
variable.description: DCCT: Any recent stress or other psychological disturbances around time of hypoglycemic episode

variable.name: ibf9
variable.description: DCCT: Other factors that could potentially contribute to hypoglycemic event were present

variable.name: ibf92dat
variable.description: DCCT: Date on which form 92 was completed

variable.name: ibhowlrn
variable.description: DCCT: How clinic learned of hypoglycemic event

variable.name: iblive
variable.description: DCCT: Patient's living arrangement

variable.name: ibuncert
variable.description: DCCT: Date of hypoglycemic event uncertain

variable.name: mask_pat
variable.description: DCCT: Patient ID number
